channel.title: Interested in getting into RSPS Development
channel.description:
Hey what's going on everyone,
I'm going to try and cut straight to the chase, I need help finding a good, clean source and client to [b]learn[/b] with. I want to learn server and client sided programming because I feel like they do differ a bit.
I used to be a part of this community a while ago and had my own server. It was delta based and from what most people say (or used to say), is that delta based servers were terribly inefficient. I used to sit on this forum and Rune-Server all day long and just leech off of spoon-fed tutorials and from the few months I spent doing that, I actually did learn a few things because of all of the "anti-leech" mechanisms people used to put, lol.
As you would guess, I forgot most of those things as they were spoon-fed to me, but now I've taken beginner courses in JAVA, C, and C++ and I have learned quite a few things about programming.
What I am looking for is a [b]clean source and client[/b], but something that also includes useful things like: skilling, barrows, pest control, fight caves. I want to [b]learn[/b], and I feel like skilling might be time-consuming, but easy to put together. minigames and instances seem a bit challenging as I am really unfamiliar with doing anything of this sort.
It wouldn't make sense for me to start a calculus course without taking algebra first, would it? Which is why I want a clean source with some of the more challenging things already implemented into the server so as I focus on some of the more easy things to program, I will learn how to program more challenging things into the server.
I've been looking around and noticed a lot of people are running PI based servers now and I've seen many threads saying how those are also somewhat filled with junk, although I've seen a few threads that have some very clean and reconstructed PI based sources, but they exclude the useful things I mentioned above.
I've searched all over the place and there seems to be only two types of sources available:
A. Completely clean sources that have literally nothing on them but combat. B. Servers loaded with junk that need to be cleaned by someone with much more expertise than me.
Now, I'm not sure If I'm even taking a step in the right direction by what I'm asking, but all input is appreciated, even if is criticizing me for taking a step in the wrong direction. It will just help guide me better in what I should be trying to do!
Thanks everyone.

item.title: Interested in getting into RSPS Development
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

You can’t ask for a clean source and then state you want the clean source to include content, because that completely defeats the “clean” aspect. If you’re after a source that has content, but not coded horrifically, then yes there are sources out there that are pretty good. You can find them in the downloads section.

https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,671275.0.html is pretty popular, I haven’t looked at it but it’s widely used and lare is a good developer
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,428517.0.html looks okay

Read full topic
item.source: Interested in getting into RSPS Development
